The Nielsen Difference

We’re in the field every day collecting and analyzing data from 100+ countries around the world.

Our data, science and people combine to provide you the information you need to understand and optimize performance across your business. Over the course of nine decades, we’ve earned the trust and built the global network that bring Nielsen (and you) closer to consumers than anyone. Our people follow wherever consumers lead, from store to screen and to the ends of the earth. We’re relentless in our pursuit of knowledge that will help you stay ahead of—and even anticipate—the next big change.

  • Data

    Our data is complete, trusted and useful, so you can depend on it when making important decisions.

  • Science

    Our science marries rigor with innovation to give your business answers that point the way forward.

  • People

    Our company is filled with truth-seekers driven to get it right for your business.

Want to know more about the Nielsen Difference? Contact us today.

    Welcome

    Nielsen Around the World allows you to explore the work we’re doing every day to collect and analyze data for our clients. (Hint: It takes a lot of people power. And coffee.)

    So the next time someone says “field auditor” or “retail survey,” you’ll know what that really means. Follow our latest stories on Instagram and Twitter at #NielsenAroundTheWorld.
